column5: Just checking if anyone has any info on how things have been going up there the past couple of weeks ( weather, water level, etc). Will be heading up there the first week in August. Any info would be appreciated.

Just got back From fishing Tetu Lake and English River just below Umfreville and Halley's. English has not turned on yet. Most fish in the lake and the Winnipeg River. Good size, several walleyes in the 26"+ class. Northern Pike good, but not great yet. Stay out of the heavier current for a few more weeks.
